com.marcolotz.MapperComponents

Class ImageStructure

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marcolotz.MapperComponents.ImageStructure

  • public class ImageStructure
extends java.lang.Object
    The object contains a list of the nodes candidates for a single image. It also contains some meta information about the image. Remember that, although it contains metadata about the image, it is of paramount importance that it does not contain the image itself, to avoid overhead. It is latter converted to the mapper value: the ImageMetaData information.
    Author:
    Marco Aurelio Lotz
